name: Friendly Cubes
description: This is my game for Brackey's "Stronger Together" game jam! Control the red cube with WASD to move towards the end of the level. You can get close to gray cubes to make them blue and control them with the same inputs. Press the "R" key to reset the level. Only six levels, but the final two are a bit challenging. ( I only had a couple days to work on it, so apologies if it's missing certain elements/features ) Have fun!
